tweet: The Atlantic Coast Pipeline supports good paying construction jobs & will bring millions in state & local taxes to West Virginia. However, opponents of this investment have used the courts to shutdown progress. I applaud @MorriseyWV’s effort to move the project forward.

Last week, my amendment that directs the Department of Defense to consider universities across the nation when looking at contracts for Rare Earth Elements pass the House as part of NDAA!

We need to ensure that the materials we buy are the biggest bang for our buck. I’m happy that my amendment passed the House so that we can focus on buying materials of the highest quality. https://www.scmp.com/news/china/article/3018452/pentagon-races-track-us-rare-earths-output-amid-trade-war-china …

As more cellphones get made & more electric vehicles hit the roads, demand for rare earth will rise. The Sec. of Energy must be included in discussions pertaining to the purchase & disposal of these minerals. Earlier this week the House passed my amendment to ensure that happens

Did you know? The sun’s ultraviolet (UV) rays can damage your skin in as little as 15 minutes. That’s why it’s important to apply broad spectrum sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher before you head outside. Learn more about skin cancer @  http://www.preventcancer.org/skincancer . #CongressionalFamilies

The ChalleNGe program has helped thousands of at-risk high school student obtain their GED or graduate from high school. My amendment, which passed as part of NDAA will allow the Department of Defense to track the success of the young men and woman who go through this program.

Last night, my amendment to require the Department of Defense to buy dinnerware and stainless steel flatware from America companies passed the House.
